text: Gei Sarai ga helekai gi Abram, “Ma di mee hala ni aau ne hai dela Hagar guu hudi dono wou mai gi di au. Ma ko au hua dela ne gowadu a mee gi di goe, nomuli gei mee ga modongoohia bolo ia gu hai dama, gei mee gaa hudi dono wou mai gi di au. Dugu ang gi Dimaadua gi haga donu ina be di ma koai dela e donu, kooe be ko au.”
